headline: Why Software Stocks Like Microsoft Face Less Risk From Tariffs, According to Morningstar
summary: Tech investors looking to reduce their risk in an unpredictable trade environment could turn to software names like Adobe and Microsoft over tech firms that depend more on hardware sales, Morningstar analysts wrote.

headline: Tesla stock jumps, Boeing earnings beat, Adobe partners with NFL
summary: As part of today's Market Minute, Madison Mills recaps some of the trending stories of the trading session. Tesla (TSLA) stock jumps despite the company's earnings miss after CEO Elon Musk told investors he would dedicate less time to his work in US President Trump's second administration starting in May. Boeing (BA) stock rises after the company's first quarter earnings report beat Wall Street's expectations. Adobe (ADBE) partners with the NFL to bring NFL-themed templates to Adobe Express. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: NFL and Adobe Launch AI-Powered Fan Experience Partnership
summary: NEW YORK, April 23, 2025--The National Football League and Adobe (Nasdaq: ADBE) announced today an expanded global partnership that combines AI, creativity and marketing to deliver a new level of AI-powered fan experiences. Ahead of the 2025 NFL Draft, Adobe is named an official partner of the NFL — a partnership that strengthens the connection fans have with their favorite NFL players and teams through enhanced content and creativity powered by Adobe applications.

raw.headline: NFL and Adobe Launch AI-Powered Fan Experience Partnership
raw.summary: NEW YORK, April 23, 2025--The National Football League and Adobe (Nasdaq: ADBE) announced today an expanded global partnership that combines AI, creativity and marketing to deliver a new level of AI-powered fan experiences.
